data.title: The joy of Sebnem Dönmez in the Yasak Elma series! – Turkish TV Series
data.text:
290

The Yasak Elma series, which is the top of the ratings on Monday evenings, is a production that the audience loves with its intrigue-filled story and comedy-rich events. The series is highly appreciated with the performances of the actors, with its story that both surprises and bursts into laughter every week, making the audience say, ‘This is not all!’.

Berk Oktay, who joined the series in the 4th season together with Eda Ece and Şevval Sam, who have been in the lead roles of the series since the first day, and Biran Damla Yılmaz and Murat Aygen, who came in the 5th season, are showing successful acting. The whole story in the series revolves around the characters played by these names. Ender, played by Şevval Sam, and Yıldız, played by Eda Ece, are the most popular characters of the series.

The series, which came to the screen with its 133rd episode this week, became the first of the day on Monday evening. In the Yasak Elma series, which ranked first in all people and AB categories, the stories are constantly changing to bring the excitement to the top. At the same time, the actors are also changing. New characters continue to come in place of many actors who left.

The latest news made the audience very happy! Because the mother of Kumru, played by Biran Damla Yılmaz, is coming! Handan Kılıç, the ex-wife of Doğan, played by Murat Aygen, is the new character of the series.

The name to play Handan Kılıç was also announced a short time ago! Şebnem Dönmez, who came to the screens with the latest TV series “Son Yaz”, is coming to the Yasak Elma series!

Moreover, it is predicted that she will make a mess with the character of Handan Kılıç!

The good news of Şebnem Dönmez’s arrival was given on Med Yapım’s social media account. The name Handan Kılıç reminded the audience of another memory! It is a matter of curiosity what kind of bond exists between Nadir Kılıç and Handan Kılıç, the biggest enemy of Halit, brought to life by Talat Bulut! In addition to the possibility of being purely a coincidence, the audience speculates that Handan is Nadir’s sister…

Let’s see what Handan Kılıç, who has just joined the series, will bring to the lives of Ender and Yıldız characters. We will watch and see…
